query:
SELECT d.id,
                   d.domain,
                   d.organization_id,
                   d.project_id,
                   d.dkim_key_type as "dkim_key_type: DkimKeyType",
                   d.dkim_pkcs8_der,
                   d.created_at,
                   d.updated_at
            FROM domains d
                LEFT JOIN projects p ON d.project_id = p.id
            WHERE d.id = $3
              AND (
                  ($2::uuid IS NULL AND d.organization_id = $1)
                      OR
                  ($2 IS NOT NULL AND d.project_id = $2 AND p.organization_id = $1)
                  )
